channel.title: First rsps
channel.description: Who was then first person to make a runescape private server?? Was on my mind:/

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:41, topic:426406”][quote author=Hash1 Single link=topic=529100.msg3862926#msg3862926 date=1324768859]

Do we really need to go over this again?

yeah
[/quote]It was made by the same person, ran by the same graphical engine, had the same layout, the only difference was a slight improvement to the graphics engine and a name change; how is that not RuneScape?[/quote]
Uncalled, I like your work and I honestly don’t want to fight/get on your bad side.

Read full topic

Do we really need to go over this again?
[/quote]

yeah[/quote]It was made by the same person, ran by the same graphical engine, had the same layout, the only difference was a slight improvement to the graphics engine and a name change; how is that not RuneScape?

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Hash1 Single, post:38, topic:426406”]Deviousmud is deviousmud,

RuneScape Classic is RuneScape

Understand children?[/quote][quote=“Uncalled, post:28, topic:426406”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=529100.msg3862266#msg3862266 date=1324747181]

DeviousMUD used RuneTek 1. Guess what else used that - RuneScape Classic.

I would assume it wasn’t RuneTek 1, because they didn’t know it was going to be RuneTek 1 and it was just DeviousMUD, and then when RSC came it became RuneTek 1.

What I’m trying to put here is, DeviousMUD wasn’t Runescape… It was DeviousMUD, then became another game > Runescape.
[/quote]It was RuneTek 1, they just hadn’t created a name for their engine at the time, after switching the names from DeviousMUD to RuneScape, they decided on RuneTek 1. It was the same code, slightly worse, then RuneTek 1.[/quote]Do we really need to go over this again?

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @Hash1_Single Hash1 Single
item.description:
@Hash1_Single wrote:

Deviousmud is deviousmud,

RuneScape Classic is RuneScape

Understand children?

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:36, topic:426406”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=529100.msg3862609#msg3862609 date=1324760737]

We were just over this, in technicality, it was RuneScape. “Basically,” it wasn’t.

Thus, making it not the first RSPS?
It would be the first DeviousMUDPS
[/quote]I was talking about this;

[quote author=ox random xi link=topic=529100.msg3862367#msg3862367 date=1324752502]
it technically wasn’t RS at that point…
[/quote][/quote]
I already agreed with you above that, in a way, it was RS.
Then I was going back to ontopic discussion.

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:32, topic:426406”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=529100.msg3862353#msg3862353 date=1324752108]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=529100.msg3862301#msg3862301 date=1324748509]

DeviousMUD used RuneTek 1. Guess what else used that - RuneScape Classic.

I would assume it wasn’t RuneTek 1, because they didn’t know it was going to be RuneTek 1 and it was just DeviousMUD, and then when RSC came it became RuneTek 1.

What I’m trying to put here is, DeviousMUD wasn’t Runescape… It was DeviousMUD, then became another game > Runescape.
[/quote]It was RuneTek 1, they just hadn’t created a name for their engine at the time, after switching the names from DeviousMUD to RuneScape, they decided on RuneTek 1. It was the same code, slightly worse, then RuneTek 1.

I’ll go with this one.
An intelligent person proved his point.
[/quote]Mhm.

And DeviousMUD wasn’t called RuneScape in the beginning for an unknown reason, though it was later switched to RuneScape because the name was, “more catchy.”[/quote]
But, to the topic, I don’t really see it being a RSPS because… well… it technically wasn’t RS at that point…

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:31, topic:426406”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=529100.msg3862301#msg3862301 date=1324748509]

DeviousMUD used RuneTek 1. Guess what else used that - RuneScape Classic.

I would assume it wasn’t RuneTek 1, because they didn’t know it was going to be RuneTek 1 and it was just DeviousMUD, and then when RSC came it became RuneTek 1.

What I’m trying to put here is, DeviousMUD wasn’t Runescape… It was DeviousMUD, then became another game > Runescape.
[/quote]It was RuneTek 1, they just hadn’t created a name for their engine at the time, after switching the names from DeviousMUD to RuneScape, they decided on RuneTek 1. It was the same code, slightly worse, then RuneTek 1.

I’ll go with this one.
An intelligent person proved his point. :)[/quote]Mhm.

And DeviousMUD wasn’t called RuneScape in the beginning for an unknown reason, though it was later switched to RuneScape because the name was, “more catchy.”

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:28, topic:426406”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=529100.msg3862266#msg3862266 date=1324747181]

DeviousMUD used RuneTek 1. Guess what else used that - RuneScape Classic.

I would assume it wasn’t RuneTek 1, because they didn’t know it was going to be RuneTek 1 and it was just DeviousMUD, and then when RSC came it became RuneTek 1.

What I’m trying to put here is, DeviousMUD wasn’t Runescape… It was DeviousMUD, then became another game > Runescape.
[/quote]It was RuneTek 1, they just hadn’t created a name for their engine at the time, after switching the names from DeviousMUD to RuneScape, they decided on RuneTek 1. It was the same code, slightly worse, then RuneTek 1.[/quote]
I’ll go with this one.
An intelligent person proved his point.

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Change happens a lot, I mean look at the pepsi logos…They changed a lot over the years.

To me it would seem that they changed the name because they moved to a larger scale maybe changed engines or something.

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:27, topic:426406”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=529100.msg3862273#msg3862273 date=1324747389]

DeviousMUD used RuneTek 1. Guess what else used that - RuneScape Classic.

I would assume it wasn’t RuneTek 1, because they didn’t know it was going to be RuneTek 1 and it was just DeviousMUD, and then when RSC came it became RuneTek 1.

What I’m trying to put here is, DeviousMUD wasn’t Runescape… It was DeviousMUD, then became another game > Runescape.

That’s like saying the 194 and 562 disambiguations aren’t the same game…
[/quote]
Why wasn’t DeviousMUD just called Runescape then?[/quote]

…because it wasn’t? ask Andrew, the guy who made it, why he changed the name… just because somethings name changes doesn’t mean it changes. sure it changed a bit

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:25, topic:426406”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=529100.msg3861962#msg3861962 date=1324710868]
DeviousMUD used RuneTek 1. Guess what else used that - RuneScape Classic.
[/quote]
I would assume it wasn’t RuneTek 1, because they didn’t know it was going to be RuneTek 1 and it was just DeviousMUD, and then when RSC came it became RuneTek 1.

What I’m trying to put here is, DeviousMUD wasn’t Runescape… It was DeviousMUD, then became another game > Runescape.[/quote]It was RuneTek 1, they just hadn’t created a name for their engine at the time, after switching the names from DeviousMUD to RuneScape, they decided on RuneTek 1. It was the same code, slightly worse, then RuneTek 1.

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Uncalled:

DeviousMUD used RuneTek 1. Guess what else used that - RuneScape Classic.

I would assume it wasn’t RuneTek 1, because they didn’t know it was going to be RuneTek 1 and it was just DeviousMUD, and then when RSC came it became RuneTek 1.

What I’m trying to put here is, DeviousMUD wasn’t Runescape… It was DeviousMUD, then became another game > Runescape.
